snippet: An updated version of the jet, with lightweight carbon-composite wings and the potential to cut fuel usage by 20 percent, is being pitched to airlines and leasing companies.
abstract: Boeing is pitching airlines and jet leasing companies on updated, larger version of its 777 passenger jet, crucial step toward winning approval from company's board to build the plane; Boeing pans to add lightweight carbon-composite wings and new engines to model to take advantage of new technologies developed for its 787 Dreamliner and to cut fuel usage by as much as 20 percent.
lead_paragraph: An updated version of the jet, with lightweight carbon-composite wings and the potential to cut fuel usage by 20 percent, is being pitched to airlines and leasing companies.

headline.seo: Boeing Is Moving Ahead With Updated 777
headline.main: Boeing Moves to Upgrade Popular 777 Passenger Jet
headline.print_headline: Boeing Moves to Upgrade Popular 777 Passenger Jet
